page.title: 20A view to the future
page.content: We thought it would be interesting to let you people of the future know what we think the future will be like. There is a threat of nuclear war, but if this fails to happen we think medical care will be more advanced and will progress in finding cures for diseases such as cancer and heart disease. The food we eat will be healthier. We hope cigarettes and alcohol will be banned but as the government rely on their income, we doubt that this will happen. We see machines playing a bigger role in school and factories possibly replacing teachers and increasing unemployment in general; this will increase free time and probably lead to even more vandalism. More factories will threaten the countryside. Rich countries will carry on helping poor but our fear of nuclear war is strong.
